game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: In this quest, you must journey to the forgotten ruins in the heart of the jungle to find a lost artifact. Beware of the dangers that lurk within!
game.reward: You will receive 500 gold coins and a rare enchantment scroll upon completion.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: Talk to the local villagers and gather information about the location of the ancient ruins.
